game.ai.shared.player

Class AIPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.ai.shared.player.AbstractPlayer
      • game.ai.shared.player.AIPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPlayer

    public class AIPlayer
extends AbstractPlayer
implements IPlayer
    This class is an implementation of IPlayer and AbstractPlayer
    AI Player updates new value for IBoard by executing CommandChain
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    btdiem

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AIPlayer()
